name: WRAP (alex)
description:
WRAP is a little puzzle-platformer where the edges of the level wrap.

  • arrow keys to move and jump
  • m to mute audio

WRAP was made in three days for Ludum Dare 38 - it was the first jam any of us had participated in. It's built with HaxeFlixel.

People who made this: alex (that's me!), Florrie, xn--x38h, PullJosh, & quaternary. The music is by 505.
